member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.DepthEnable
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable depth testing. Set this member to TRUE to enable depth testing.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.DepthWriteMask
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies a portion of the depth-stencil buffer that can be modified by depth data.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.DepthFunc
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies a function that compares depth data against existing depth data.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.StencilEnable
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable stencil testing. Set this member to TRUE to enable stencil testing.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.StencilReadMask
member.summary: Identify a portion of the depth-stencil buffer for reading stencil data.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.StencilWriteMask
member.summary: Identify a portion of the depth-stencil buffer for writing stencil data.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.FrontFace
member.summary: A structure that describes how to use the results of the depth test and the stencil test for pixels whose surface normal is facing towards the camera.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.BackFace
member.summary: A structure that describes how to use the results of the depth test and the stencil test for pixels whose surface normal is facing away from the camera.
